code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Predict(){const[image,setImage]=useState(null);const[task,setTask]=useState('detection');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const handlePredict=async()=>{if(!image){setMessage('Please select an image file.');return;}const endpoint=task==='detection'?'/predict-detect':'/predict-seg';const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',image);try{const response=await axios.post(endpoint,formData,{responseType:'blob'});const imageUrl=URL.createObjectURL(response.data);setResult(imageUrl);setMessage('');}catch(error){setMessage('Error making prediction.');console.error(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Predict with a Model"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Image: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setImage(e.target.files[0])})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Model: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:task,onChange:e=>setTask(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"detection",children:"Object Detection"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"segmentation",children:"Image Segmentation"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePredict,children:"Run Prediction"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),result&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Prediction Result"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:result,alt:"Prediction result"})]})]});}export default Predict;
